Package android.support.v17.leanback.supportleanbackshowcase.cards.presenters

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCardPresenter<T extends android.support.v17.leanback.widget.BaseCardView>
    This abstract, generic class will create and manage the ViewHolder and will provide typed Presenter callbacks such that you do not have to perform casts on your own.
    CardPresenter  
    CardPresenterSelector
    This PresenterSelector will decide what Presenter to use depending on a given card's type.
    CharacterCardPresenter
    This Presenter is used to display the characters card row in the DetailView.
    CustomImageCardViewPresenter
    This class extends AbstractCardPresenter and is the Presenter class for CustomImageCardView
    IconCardInChannelPublishPresenter
    This Presenter will display cards which consists of a single icon which will be highlighted by a surrounding circle when the card is focused.
    IconCardPresenter
    This Presenter will display cards which consists of a single icon which will be highlighted by a surrounding circle when the card is focused.
    ImageCardViewPresenter
    A very basic ImageCardView Presenter.You can pass a custom style for the ImageCardView in the constructor.
    SideInfoCardPresenter
    This Presenter will display a card consisting of an image on the left side of the card followed by text on the right side.
    SingleLineCardPresenter
    This Presenter will display a card which consists of a big image followed by a colored footer.
    TextCardPresenter
    The Presenter displays a card consisting of text as a replacement for a big image.
